serotonin.role: Emotional stability, intuition, nurturing, social bonding
serotonin.high_levels_indicate: Emotional intelligence, natural warmth, protective instincts, deep intuition, spiritual connection
serotonin.in_dating: Creates emotional safety, enables deep bonding, supports long-term relationship stability, enhances trust
serotonin.attraction_factor: People are naturally drawn to serotonin-dominant individuals because they create feelings of safety and security

dopamine.high_levels_indicate: Confidence, leadership, adventurousness, goal-orientation, competitive drive
dopamine.in_dating: Creates excitement and anticipation, fuels pursuit and courtship, supports ambition-driven attraction
dopamine.attraction_factor: People are naturally drawn to dopamine-dominant individuals because they project confidence and excitement

oxytocin.how_it_works: Released during positive social interactions, physical touch, and moments of trust
oxytocin.in_dating: The chemical that creates the feeling of falling in love, deepens emotional bonds, makes people want to stay close
oxytocin.gender_differences: Women typically experience stronger oxytocin responses to emotional trust and conversation. Men often need physical touch or shared experiences to trigger oxytocin release.
oxytocin.building_it: Eye contact, shared vulnerability, physical touch, genuine compliments, emotional availability, consistency

high_serotonin_high_dopamine.description: The rare combination of deep emotional intelligence and driven ambition
high_serotonin_high_dopamine.attraction_power: Incredibly magnetic because they combine emotional depth with purpose and drive
high_serotonin_high_dopamine.dating_advantage: Can create both deep emotional connection and exciting momentum in relationships
high_serotonin_high_dopamine.challenges: Can be overwhelming for people seeking simplicity; depth may scare off casual daters

high_serotonin_moderate_dopamine.attraction_power: People feel safe and cared for around them, naturally creating desire for closeness
high_serotonin_moderate_dopamine.dating_advantage: Excellent at building long-term relationships and creating emotional security
high_serotonin_moderate_dopamine.challenges: May over-give or settle for less than they deserve; need to balance nurturing with self-worth

moderate_serotonin_high_dopamine.description: Driven by excellence and achievement with emotional stability
moderate_serotonin_high_dopamine.attraction_power: Project confidence and high standards, attracting people who want to be with someone exceptional
moderate_serotonin_high_dopamine.dating_advantage: Won't settle for less than they deserve; naturally discerning about partners
moderate_serotonin_high_dopamine.challenges: May be perceived as intimidating or too critical; need to balance standards with openness

moderate_serotonin_very_high_dopamine.attraction_power: Command attention and respect, naturally attracting people drawn to strength and direction
moderate_serotonin_very_high_dopamine.dating_advantage: Decisive and action-oriented in dating; go after what they want
moderate_serotonin_very_high_dopamine.challenges: May struggle with vulnerability and emotional connection; need to balance strength with openness

initial_spark.dopamine_role: The excitement and anticipation of potential connection - the 'chase' energy
initial_spark.serotonin_role: Feeling safe and intrigued by someone's emotional intelligence and stability
initial_spark.timing: Dopamine often spikes first (excitement), with serotonin building the foundation for lasting attraction

deepening_connection.oxytocin_building: Moments of vulnerability, trust, and physical intimacy trigger oxytocin release
deepening_connection.neurochemical_match: Compatible neurochemistry means both people get what they need - excitement and security
deepening_connection.bonding_patterns: Consistency and emotional safety build oxytocin over time, creating lasting attachment

long_term_love.serotonin_stability: Long-term relationships require serotonin's emotional stability and intuition
long_term_love.dopamine_maintenance: Keeping the spark alive requires ongoing dopamine through shared goals and growth
long_term_love.oxytocin_ongoing: Regular positive interactions and physical touch maintain oxytocin bonding
long_term_love.the_balance: Healthy long-term love balances all three chemicals in sustainable ways

men.typical_neurochemistry: Often dopamine-driven for pursuit, but need oxytocin triggers through physical touch, shared activities, and feeling trusted and respected
men.oxytocin_triggers: Physical touch, eye contact during intimate conversation, feeling needed and capable, shared achievements, genuine appreciation
men.serotonin_needs: Men with high serotonin need to feel they can protect and provide, even in modern partnership dynamics
men.attraction_patterns: Often respond well to directness and confidence, but need emotional safety to open up vulnerably
men.dating_tips: Men often bond through doing things together and feeling competent. Shared activities, genuine compliments about their capabilities, and giving them space to pursue can build deep attraction.

women.typical_neurochemistry: Often more serotonin-sensitive for emotional connection, respond strongly to oxytocin through emotional intimacy, conversation, and feeling understood
women.oxytocin_triggers: Emotional conversation, feeling heard and understood, eye contact, verbal expressions of care, consistency and reliability
women.dopamine_needs: Women with high dopamine need excitement and growth, not just stability and safety
women.attraction_patterns: Often respond well to emotional intelligence and depth, but also need challenge and adventure to maintain attraction
women.dating_tips: Women often bond through conversation and emotional availability. Deep conversations, genuine emotional engagement, and showing you understand them can create powerful attraction.

building_attraction.high_serotonin_types: Create emotional safety through active listening, emotional intelligence, and showing you understand them deeply
building_attraction.high_dopamine_types: Match their energy, share exciting goals, challenge them, and show you have your own ambitions
building_attraction.balanced_approach: Learn your archetype's neurochemistry and communicate in ways that trigger the right responses in your date

reading_signals.serotonin_signs: They seem relaxed, emotionally present, make eye contact, share feelings openly
reading_signals.dopamine_signs: They seem excited, energetic, talk about goals and ambitions, appear confident and forward-moving
reading_signals.oxytocin_signs: Physical closeness, lingering touches, deep eye contact, feeling of safety and comfort, wanting to spend more time together
reading_signals.mismatch_signals: If you're high serotonin and they're only high dopamine, you might feel they're too superficial. If you're high dopamine and they're only high serotonin, you might feel bored.

enhancing_chemistry.for_serotonin_dominance: Deep conversations, emotional vulnerability, creating safety, consistent communication
enhancing_chemistry.for_dopamine_dominance: Exciting activities, goal-sharing, playful challenges, maintaining mystery and pursuit
enhancing_chemistry.for_both: Balance emotional connection with excitement, create both safety and adventure in the relationship

powerful_combinations.maiden_knight: Both high serotonin - creates incredibly warm, nurturing, secure relationships
powerful_combinations.queen_warrior: Both high dopamine - creates power couple energy, mutual drive and ambition
powerful_combinations.mystic_magician: Both very high serotonin and dopamine - rare but incredibly deep and driven connections
powerful_combinations.huntress_king: Both very high dopamine - intense, action-oriented, leadership-driven relationships

complementary_combinations.maiden_warrior: Warmth and nurturing meets drive and ambition - balance of stability and excitement
complementary_combinations.queen_knight: High standards and discernment meets chivalrous protection - sophisticated yet caring
complementary_combinations.mystic_huntress: Deep intuition meets driven action - emotional depth with purpose and direction
complementary_combinations.magician_king: Perceptive insight meets natural leadership - emotionally intelligent strength
